page.title: 10TOURISM & THE BRADFORD AREA
page.content:
Being situated about 5 miles north of the {M62,}directly linked to this by the{M606,}and about 12 miles from the {M1, }Bradford is 'central' to the tourist trade. Over 150 tour operators use the City as a base. A recent survey of accommodation found that at times hotel space in the City was over-stretched and more is required. The villages of Esholt, Haworth and Saltaire are attracting a growing number of visitors owing to their links with{YTV's "Emmerdale Farm",}the {Bronte Family,}and industrialist {Sir. {Titus Salt.
There is often a conflict between the needs of the local community and the demands of tourism - for car and coach parks, toilets and extra shops and cafes.
